statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_name DESC;
SELECT key_id, encryption_type FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_type = 'AES';
SELECT key_name, key_value, encryption_type FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_value ASC;
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value, encryption_type FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT key_name, key_id, encryption_type, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%master%' ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(key_id) AS total_keys, encryption_type FROM encryption_keys GROUP BY encryption_type HAVING total_keys > 1;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_type = 'AES' AND key_value LIKE '1%' ORDER BY key_id ASC;
SELECT key_name, CONCAT(key_name, ' - ', encryption_type) AS key_info FROM encryption_keys WHERE LENGTH(key_name) > 10 LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cert_name, expiry_date FROM certificates WHERE cert_name LIKE '%SSL%';
SELECT cert_id, cert_data FROM certificates ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value = 'secret key';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT cert_name, expiry_date FROM certificates WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cert_name, cert_data FROM certificates WHERE cert_name LIKE '%production%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'MasterKey';
SELECT cert_id, cert_name, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mapping_id, key_id, cert_id FROM key_certificate_mapping ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT cert_name, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT key_name, cert_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys JOIN key_certificate_mapping ON encryption_keys.id = key_certificate_mapping.key_id JOIN certificates ON key_certificate_mapping.cert_id = certificates.cert_id;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM key_certificate_mapping WHERE key_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_value, key_description FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE cert_description LIKE '%example%';
SELECT c.cert_id, k.key_id FROM certificates c INNER JOIN key_usage ku ON c.cert_id = ku.cert_id INNER JOIN encryption_keys k ON ku.key_id = k.key_id;
SELECT key_id, key_value, key_description FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE cert_description ILIKE 'important%';
SELECT key_id, cert_id FROM key_usage WHERE key_id = 'ec67dcdc-3d77-43d9-b03e-1a2db0227211';
SELECT * FROM key_usage WHERE cert_id IN (SELECT cert_id FROM certificates WHERE LENGTH(cert_data) > 1000);
SELECT * FROM key_permissions ORDER BY permission_name;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value, encryption_date FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY encryption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date > NOW() ORDER BY expiration_date;

SELECT key_name, cert_name, expiration_date FROM encryption_keys JOIN key_cert_mapping ON encryption_keys.key_id = key_cert_mapping.key_id JOIN certificates ON key_cert_mapping.cert_id = certificates.cert_id;
SELECT key_id, description FROM key_usage WHERE description ILIKE '%secure%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'Master Key';
SELECT key_id, key_name, encryption_date FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cert_name, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT kc.mapping_id, k.key_name, c.cert_name FROM key_cert_mapping kc INNER JOIN encryption_keys k ON kc.key_id = k.key_id INNER JOIN certificates c ON kc.cert_id = c.cert_id;

SELECT kr.rotation_id, k.key_name, kr.rotation_date, ku.description FROM key_rotation kr LEFT JOIN encryption_keys k ON kr.key_id = k.key_id LEFT JOIN key_usage ku ON k.key_id = ku.key_id WHERE kr.rotation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
